mapper.insert: insert into tbl_item(originalprice, saleprice, color, size, stock, productid) values(#{originalprice}, #{saleprice}, #{color}, #{size}, #{stock}, #{productid} )
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tbl_item as i, tbl_product as p WHERE i.productid = p.productid
AND p.productname LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND i.${searchOption} LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'

SELECT itemid, originalprice, saleprice, color, size, stock, productid, productname FROM (SELECT (@row_number:=@row_number+1) as row_number, p.productname, i.* FROM tbl_item as i, tbl_product as p, (SELECT @row_number:=0) as t WHERE i.productid = p.productid
AND p.productname LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND i.${searchOption} LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
ORDER BY itemid DESC ) X WHERE X.row_number BETWEEN #{first} and #{last}
SELECT DISTINCT color FROM tbl_item WHERE productid = #{productid}
SELECT * FROM tbl_item WHERE color = #{color} AND productid = #{productid}
SELECT * FROM tbl_item WHERE color = #{color} AND size = #{size} AND productid = #{productid}
SELECT COALESCE(sum(stock), 0) FROM tbl_item WHERE productid = #{productid}
